chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Hypotheses:
R: Type
Rone: R
Rzero: R
Rminus: R -> R -> R
Rmult: R -> R -> R
Rplus: R -> R -> R
Ropp: R -> R
R_is_ring: ring_theory z o Rplus Rmult Rminus ∸ eq
n: nat
y: R
x: R

Goal:
expo22 n (x, z, z, y) = (expoR n x, z, z, expoR n y)

Premises:
Notation expoR := (mscal Rmult o)
Inductive eq (A : Type) (x : A) : A -> Prop := eq_refl : x = x Arguments eq {A}%type_scope Arguments eq_refl {A}%type_scope {x}, [A] _
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
ring_theory : forall R : Type, R -> R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> (R -> R -> Prop) -> Prop
Notation o := Rone
Notation expo22 := (mscal MU22 ID_22)
Notation z := Rzero
Rring_ring_lemma1 : forall (n : nat) (l : list R) (lpe : list (Ring_polynom.PExpr Z * Ring_polynom.PExpr Z)) (pe1 pe2 : Ring_polynom.PExpr Z), Ring_polynom.interp_PElist z o Rplus Rmult Rminus ∸ eq (gen_phiZ z o Rplus Rmult ∸) id_phi_N (pow_N o Rmult) l lpe ->...-> Ring_polynom.PEeval z o Rplus Rmult Rminus ∸ (gen_phiZ z o Rplus Rmult ∸) id_phi_N (pow_N o Rmult) l pe1 = Ring_polynom.PEeval z o Rplus Rmult Rminus ∸ (gen_phiZ z o Rplus Rmult ∸) id_phi_N (pow_N o Rmult) l pe2
ID_22 = (o, z, z, o) : M22
ZE_22 = (z, z, z, z) : M22
mk_rt : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), (forall x : R, req (radd rO x) x) -> (forall x y : R, req (radd x y) (radd y x)) -> (forall x y z : R, req (radd x (radd y z)) (radd (radd x y) z)) -> (forall x : R, req (rmul rI x) x) -> (forall x y : R, req (rmul x y) (rmul y x)) -> (forall x y z : R, req (rmul x (rmul y z)) (rmul (rmul x y) z)) -> (forall x y z : R, req (rmul (radd x y) z) (radd (rmul x z) (rmul y z))) ->...-> ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req
pow_N : forall R : Type, R -> (R -> R -> R) -> R -> N -> R
RingMicromega.eval_op1 : forall R : Type, R -> (R -> R -> Prop) -> (R -> R -> Prop) -> (R -> R -> Prop) -> RingMicromega.Op1 -> R -> Prop
RingMicromega.eval_nformula : forall R : Type, R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> Prop) -> (R -> R -> Prop) -> (R -> R -> Prop) -> forall C : Type, (C -> R) -> RingMicromega.PolEnv R -> RingMicromega.NFormula C -> Prop
RingMicromega.eval_pol : forall R : Type, (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> forall C : Type, (C -> R) -> RingMicromega.PolEnv R -> RingMicromega.PolC C -> R
RingMicromega.PolEnv = fun R : Type => Env.Env R : Type -> Type Arguments RingMicromega.PolEnv _%type_scope
ZifyClasses.mkrel : forall (S T : Type) (R : S -> S -> Prop) (I : S -> T) (TR : T -> T -> Prop), (forall n m : S, R n m <-> TR (I n) (I m)) -> forall (s1 : S) (t1 : T), I s1 = t1 -> forall (s2 : S) (t2 : T), I s2 = t2 -> R s1 s2 < -> TR t1 t2
Det22 = fun X : M22 => let (p, x) := X in (let (p0, x) := p in (let (a, b) := p0 in fun c d : R => a ⊗ d ⊕ ∸ (b ⊗ c)) x) x : M22 -> R
MI22 = fun X : M22 => let (p, x) := X in (let (p0, x) := p in (let (a, b) := p0 in fun c d : R => (∸ a, ∸ b, ∸ c, ∸ d)) x) x : M22 -> M22
Inverse_Image.wf_inverse_image : forall (A B : Type) (R : B -> B -> Prop) (f : A -> B), well_founded R -> well_founded (fun x y : A => R (f x) (f y))
M22scal = fun (k : R) (X : M22) => let (p, x) := X in (let (p0, x) := p in (let (u, v) := p0 in fun w z : R => (k ⊗ u, k ⊗ v, k ⊗ w, k ⊗ z)) x) x : R -> M22 -> M22
RingMicromega.eval_pol_add : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt ->...-> forall (env : RingMicromega.PolEnv R) (lhs rhs : EnvRing.Pol C), req (RingMicromega.eval_pol rplus rtimes phi env (RingMicromega.padd cO cplus ceqb lhs rhs)) (rplus (RingMicromega.eval_pol rplus rtimes phi env lhs) (RingMicromega.eval_pol rplus rtimes phi env rhs))
expo22_scal : forall (k : R) (n : nat) (U : M22), expo22 n (M22scal k U) = M22scal (expoR n k) (expo22 n U)
mscal_sum : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (n : nat) (x y : X), m x y = m y x -> mscal m u n (m x y) = m (mscal m u n x) (mscal m u n y)
scal_times : forall (X : Type) (sum times : X -> X -> X) (zero one : X), monoid_theory sum zero -> (forall x u v : X, sum x u = sum x v -> u = v) -> monoid_theory times one -> (forall x y z : X, times x (sum y z) = sum (times x y) (times x z)) -> forall (k : nat) (x y : X), mscal sum zero k (times x y) = times x (mscal sum zero k y)
M22 = (R * R * R * R)%type : Type
sum_0n_distr_l : forall (X : Type) (sum times : X -> X -> X) (zero one : X), monoid_theory sum zero -> (forall x u v : X, sum x u = sum x v -> u = v) -> monoid_theory times one -> (forall x y z : X, times x (sum y z) = sum (times x y) (times x z)) -> forall (b : X) (n : nat) (f : nat -> X), msum sum zero n (fun i : nat => times b (f i)) = times b (msum sum zero n f)
mk_monoid : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), (forall x : X, m u x = x) -> (forall x : X, m x u = x) -> (forall x y z : X, m x (m y z) = m (m x y) z) -> monoid_theory m u
binomial_Newton : forall (X : Type) (sum times : X -> X -> X) (zero one : X), monoid_theory sum zero -> (forall x y : X, sum x y = sum y x) -> (forall x u v : X, sum x u = sum x v -> u = v) -> monoid_theory times one -> (forall x y z : X, times x (sum y z) = sum (times x y) (times x z)) -> (forall x y z : X, times (sum y z) x = sum (times y x) (times z x)) -> forall (n : nat) (a b : X), times a b = times b a -> mscal times one n (sum a b) = msum sum zero (S n) (fun i : nat => mscal sum zero (binomial n i) (times (mscal times one (n - i) a) (mscal times one i b)))
mscal_M22scal : forall (n : nat) (x : M22), mscal PL22 ZE_22 n x = M22scal (mscal Rplus z n o) x
times_zero_r : forall (X : Type) (sum times : X -> X -> X) (zero one : X), monoid_theory sum zero -> (forall x u v : X, sum x u = sum x v -> u = v) -> monoid_theory times one -> (forall x y z : X, times x (sum y z) = sum (times x y) (times x z)) -> forall x : X, times x zero = zero
Record monoid_theory (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X) : Prop := mk_monoid { monoid_unit_l : forall x : X, m u x = x; monoid_unit_r : forall x : X, m x u = x; monoid_assoc : forall x y z : X, m x (m y z) = m (m x y) z } Arguments monoid_theory [X]%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments mk_monoid [X]%type_scope _%function_scope _ (_ _ _)%function_scope
Det22_expo : forall (n : nat) (x : M22), Det22 (expo22 n x) = expoR n (Det22 x)
msum_ext : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X) (n : nat) (f g : nat -> X), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i = g i) -> msum m u n f = msum m u n g
Zdiv_rest = fun (x : Z) (p : positive) => let (qr, _) := Pos.iter Zdiv_rest_aux (x, 0%Z, 1%Z) p in qr : Z -> positive -> Z * Z Arguments Zdiv_rest _%Z_scope _%positive_scope
msum_mscal : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (n k : nat) (f : nat -> X), (forall i j : nat, i < n -> j < n -> m (f i) (f j) = m (f j) (f i)) -> msum m u n (fun i : nat => mscal m u k (f i)) = mscal m u k (msum m u n f)
msum_sum : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (n : nat) (f g : nat -> X), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> m (f j) (g i) = m (g i) (f j)) -> msum m u n (fun i : nat => m (f i) (g i)) = m (msum m u n f) (msum m u n g)
binomial_gt : forall n p : nat, n < p -> binomial n p = 0
msum_msum : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (n k : nat) (f : nat -> nat -> X), (forall i1 j1 i2 j2 : nat, i1 < n -> j1 < k -> i2 < n -> j2 < k -> m (f i1 j1) (f i2 j2) = m (f i2 j2) (f i1 j1)) -> msum m u n (fun i : nat => msum m u k (f i)) = msum m u k (fun j : nat => msum m u n (fun i : nat => f i j))
BinPosDef.Pos.sub = fun x y : positive => match BinPosDef.Pos.sub_mask x y with | BinPosDef.Pos.IsPos z => z | _ => 1%positive end : positive -> positive -> positive Arguments BinPosDef.Pos.sub (_ _)%positive_scope
mscal_comm : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (n : nat) (x y : X), m x y = m y x -> m (mscal m u n x) y = m y (mscal m u n x)
PL22 = fun X : M22 => let (p, x) := X in (let (p0, x) := p in (let (a, b) := p0 in fun (c d : R) (X0 : M22) => let (p1, x) := X0 in (let (p2, x) := p1 in (let (a', b') := p2 in fun c' d' : R => (a ⊕ a', b ⊕ b', c ⊕ c', d ⊕ d')) x) x) x) x : M22 -> M22 -> M22
ZifyClasses.mkapp : forall (S1 S2 T : Type) (OP : S1 -> S2) (I1 : S1 -> T) (I2 : S2 -> T) (TUOP : T -> T), (forall n : S1, I2 (OP n) = TUOP (I1 n)) -> forall (s1 : S1) (t1 : T), I1 s1 = t1 -> I2 (OP s1) = TUOP t1
BinIntDef.Z.sub = fun m n : Z => (m + - n)%Z : Z -> Z -> Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.sub (_ _)%Z_scope
two_power_nat = fun n : nat => Z.pos (shift_nat n 1) : nat -> Z Arguments two_power_nat _%nat_scope
BinIntDef.Z.max = fun n m : Z => match (n ?= m)%Z with | Lt => m | _ => n end : Z -> Z -> Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.max (_ _)%Z_scope
ZifyClasses.mkapp2 : forall (S1 S2 S3 T : Type) (Op : S1 -> S2 -> S3) (I1 : S1 -> T) (I2 : S2 -> T) (I3 : S3 -> T) (TBOP : T -> T -> T), (forall (n : S1) (m : S2), I3 (Op n m) = TBOP (I1 n) (I2 m)) -> forall (s1 : S1) (t1 : T), I1 s1 = t1 -> forall (s2 : S2) (t2 : T), I2 s2 = t2 -> I3 (Op s1 s2) = TBOP t1 t2

``` 
unfold expo22.
unfold mscal.
rewrite Det22_expo.
unfold expo22 in IHn.
rewrite IHn.
simpl.
reflexivity.
```
